revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-860L |revision=A1 |upc=790069389726, 790069413049 |asin=B00CCIL9NU |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRG-AC03 |est_release_date=04/2013 |fcc_date=02/18/2013 |fcc_id=KA2IR860LA1, RRK-2012070022 |ic_id=4216A-IR860LA1, 4833A-WMCAC02A1 |pcb_id=8WMCAC02.1A1G |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47081A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H64M16HR-25E:H |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1 |wi1_module=Alpha Networks WMC-AC02 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4352 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5 GHz Front End Module (FEM);RF Micro Devices;RFFM4501;;2; |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36.4;brcmarm+; |tp_firmware=DD-WRT (beta) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, dlink-XXXX-media, dlink-XXXX-5GHz |default_ssid_regex=^dlink-[a-f0-9A-F]{4}$,,, ^dlink-[a-f0-9A-F]{4}-media$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=''randomly generated'' |oui=70:62:B8 |oui_eth=70:62:B8 }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1200 Dual-Band Gigabit Cloud Router}} :[http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-860l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-router Product page]
Per the FCC label, the default SSID patterns are '''dlink-XXXX''' and '''dlink-XXXX-media'''.
*"WRGAC03" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. *"WMCAC02" (under the shield) and "8WMCAC02.1A1G" (on the back) :is silkscreened on the 802.11ac wireless module.
===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32211-d-link-dir-860l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/175-d-link-dir-860l.html On '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU)
